verses.verse: Michtam <S%H4387><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>. Preserve <S%H8104><s%> me, O God <S%H410><s%>: for in thee do I put my trust <S%H2620><s%>. Michtam: or, A golden Psalm
O my soul, thou hast said <S%H559><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, Thou art my Lord <S%H136><s%>: my goodness <S%H2896><s%> extendeth not to thee;
But to the saints <S%H6918><s%> that <S%H1992><s%> are in the earth <S%H776><s%>, and to the excellent <S%H117><s%>, in whom is all my delight <S%H2656><s%>.

Their sorrows <S%H6094><s%> shall be multiplied <S%H7235><s%> that hasten <S%H4116><s%> after another <S%H312><s%> god: their drink offerings <S%H5262><s%> of blood <S%H1818><s%> will I not offer <S%H5258><s%>, nor <S%H1077><s%> take up <S%H5375><s%> their names <S%H8034><s%> into my lips <S%H8193><s%>. hasten: or, give gifts to another
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> is the portion <S%H4490><s%> of mine inheritance <S%H2506><s%> and of my cup <S%H3563><s%>: thou maintainest <S%H8551><s%> my lot <S%H1486><s%>. of mine: Heb. of my part
The lines <S%H2256><s%> are fallen <S%H5307><s%> unto me in pleasant <S%H5273><s%> places; yea, I have a goodly <S%H8231><s%> heritage <S%H5159><s%>.
I will bless <S%H1288><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, who hath given me counsel <S%H3289><s%>: my reins <S%H3629><s%> also instruct <S%H3256><s%> me in the night seasons <S%H3915><s%>.
I have set <S%H7737><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> always <S%H8548><s%> before me: because he is at my right hand <S%H3225><s%>, I shall not be moved <S%H4131><s%>.

Therefore my heart <S%H3820><s%> is glad <S%H8055><s%>, and my glory <S%H3519><s%> rejoiceth <S%H1523><s%>: my flesh <S%H1320><s%> also shall rest <S%H7931><s%> in hope <S%H983><s%>. rest: Heb. dwell confidently
For thou wilt not leave <S%H5800><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> in hell <S%H7585><s%>; neither wilt thou suffer <S%H5414><s%> thine Holy One <S%H2623><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> corruption <S%H7845><s%>.

Thou wilt shew <S%H3045><s%> me the path <S%H734><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%>: in thy presence <S%H6440><s%> is fulness <S%H7648><s%> of joy <S%H8057><s%>; at thy right hand <S%H3225><s%> there are pleasures <S%H5273><s%> for evermore <S%H5331><s%>.
